languages.text: "Что ты думаешь об обвинениях рода Версериан? Они действительно могут быть виновны?"

traits.locale_text: "Что ты думаешь об обвинениях рода Версериан? Они действительно могут быть виновны?"

languages.text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"
languages.original_text: "Что ты думаешь об обвинениях рода Версериан? Они действительно могут быть виновны?"

traits.locale_text: "What do you think about the accusations towards the Werserian family? Can they truly be responsible?
"What do you think about the accusations towards the Werserian family? Can they truly be responsible?

"What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"
"What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン家に対する告発をどう思う？本当に有罪なのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン家に対する告発をどう思う？本当に有罪なのだろうか？」

languages.text: “针对韦尔森家族的指控，你是怎么想的？你认为他们真的有罪吗？”
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: “针对韦尔森家族的指控，你是怎么想的？你认为他们真的有罪吗？”

languages.text: « Que pensez-vous des accusations portées à l'encontre des Werserian ? Les croyez-vous vraiment coupables ? »
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: « Que pensez-vous des accusations portées à l'encontre des Werserian ? Les croyez-vous vraiment coupables ? »

languages.text: «¿Qué opina de los cargos contra la familia Werserian? ¿Es posible que sean los verdaderos culpables?».
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué opina de los cargos contra la familia Werserian? ¿Es posible que sean los verdaderos culpables?».

languages.text: "Was sagt Ihr zu den Vorwürfen gegen die Familie Werserian? Könnten sie tatsächlich schuldig sein?"
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: "Was haltet Ihr von den Vorwürfen gegen die Familie Werserian? Kann sie wirklich schuldig sein?"

languages.text: "Werserian Hanesi aleyhindeki ithamlarla ilgili ne düşünüyorsun? Bu işin faili, sahiden onlar olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "What do you make of the charges against the Werserian family? Could they truly be guilty?"

traits.locale_text: "Werserian Hanesi aleyhindeki ithamlarla ilgili ne düşünüyorsun? Failler sahiden onlar olabilir mi?"
